data.name: KAIJU MONSTER VR Demo
data.detailed_description:
90's, metropolis

You play as a giant monster whose only desire is destruction.
Confront enemy units, ravage cities and cause as much destruction as possible.

Demo feature list:
  • Control a giant monster
  • Destroy urban environment
  • Fight enemy military units (planes, tanks, rocket launchers, etc.)
  • Shoot laser beams and anti-gravity weapon
  • Throw enemy units to cause havoc
  • Manage your energy level and temperature by destroying buildings and water sources (water towers, ice cream trucks, etc.)

KAIJU MONSTER VR DEMO will be released for OCULUS RIFT and HTC VIVE.

data.short_description: 90's, metropolis You play as a giant monster whose only desire is destruction. Confront enemy units, ravage cities and cause as much destruction as possible.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060/AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
